bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make yummy honey!
⚫️ I have black and yellow stripes.
🐝 I say 'Bzzzzzz'!

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a small beetle.
🍀 People believe I bring good luck.
🪴 I like to eat aphids on plants.

bug.question: I march in a line. I carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony.
🌿 I can be found crawling on the ground.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I make chirping sounds.
🌱 I eat plants.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then fly with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I like to drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I go through metamorphosis.
🌈 My wings have beautiful patterns.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have eight legs.
🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🪰 I eat flies and other insects.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I shine in the dark.
🌃 You can see me in summer evenings.
💡I use bioluminescence.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and like to bite people in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I have a long, thin nose.
🩸 I drink blood.
🚫 People don't like me buzzing around their ears.

bug.question: I eat wood, and can cause trouble in houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I can live inside of wooden structures.
🪵 I eat wood.
🐜 I live in a colony with a queen.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long, skinny legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near ponds and lakes.
🐾 I use surface tension to stay on top of the water.
🌊 I catch small insects to eat.

transport.question: I have wheels and go vroom vroom! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You can ride in me.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
🛣️ I drive on roads.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you to different places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I can be big or small.
🛥️ You might see me on a lake or ocean.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me with your feet.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🛣️ I am good for short trips.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 Many people can sit inside me.
✈️ I go to the airport.

transport.question: I am long and carry many people. I run on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a choo-choo sound
🛤️ I follow a special path.
⏱️ I can take you to different cities.

transport.question: I am a big vehicle that takes lots of kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a sign that says 'stop'.
🟡 I am often yellow.
🎒 Students ride on me every day.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have a propeller.
🚑 I can be used to rescue people.
☁️ I don't need a runway to take off.

transport.question: I travel under the ground to take many people around a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You go down stairs to ride me.
🌃 I help people get around busy cities.
⬛ I run on electricity.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that helps put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am usually red.
🚨 I have a loud siren.
💧 I carry lots of water.

transport.question: I take people to space! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I can go to the moon.
